trivia_items.text: Her codename and tribe's name are referring to the genus of anaconda, and she has the traits of a green anaconda (Eunectes murinus), as shown by her tail. The word itself means "good swimmer" in Greek (Eυνήκτης).
Her name, Zumama, likely derives from zuma, which means "anger" in Nahuatl.
According to her illustrator Liduke, Eunectes is based on Mako Mori from Pacific Rim.
The High Priest is present in Eunectes' Elite 2 and Forgemaster artworks.
Eunectes is one of the few characters in Arknights who wears revealing clothes (excluding Operator outfits), likely because of her origins – the tropical jungles of Acahualla.
Eunectes is a part of the "Cheese Sandwich Formation Force (CN: 两面包夹芝士)" meme in the CN community.
sub_items: During Arknights' 2nd Anniversary event, a Bilibili uploader named 一只大哈鱼 drunkenly spent almost 3000 RMB (around $460 USD) in purchasing Originite Prime in order to pull for the Skalter/Kal'tsit banner. He recorded the video (thinking he was streaming), mumbling to himself things such as "to sandwich Japan with our forces in order to save Skadi from nuclear waste!" and "We're too weak (to save her)!" He even purchased plane tickets to Beijing and Nanjing.
Towards the end of his recording, he purchased Eunectes' Forgemaster outfit, shouted, "I love Eunectes (or 森RUA in Chinese) forever!" and made her his Assistant.
By the time he woke up sober the next morning, he uploaded an apology video. During the recording, he responded to Eunectes' Idle dialogue by telling her to shut up.
